Question
========

The standard error of the sample mean of *n* observations is obtained from the standard deviation of the sample by

Answerlist
----------

* Dividing by √ n
* Divide by n
* Multiply by √ n
* Multiply by n

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Divide by √ n: Correct
* Divide by n: Incorrect
* To multiply by √ n: Incorrect
* Multiply by n: Incorrect
